mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHREPLY(ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, BTYPE, WDATE, CONTENT, PARENT, BPARENT, DEL) VALUES (#{id},(SELECT IFNULL(MAX(REF),0)+1 FROM SHREPLY r), 0,0,#{btype},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'),#{content},0,#{bparent},0)
mapper.update: UPDATE SHREPLY SET DEL = 1 WHERE seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHREPLY(ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, BTYPE, WDATE, CONTENT, PARENT, BPARENT, DEL) VALUES (#{id},(SELECT REF FROM SHREPLY r WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM SHREPLY r WHERE SEQ=#{seq})+1, (SELECT DEPTH FROM SHREPLY r WHERE SEQ=#{seq})+1, (SELECT BTYPE FROM SHREPLY r WHERE SEQ=#{seq}),DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'),#{content},#{seq}, (SELECT BPARENT FROM SHREPLY r WHERE SEQ=#{seq}),0)
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, BTYPE, WDATE, CONTENT, PARENT, BPARENT, DEL FROM SHREPLY WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE SHREPLY SET CONTENT=#{content} WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 as rnn, SEQ, r.ID as ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, BTYPE, WDATE, CONTENT, PARENT, BPARENT, r.DEL as DEL, u.NAME as NAME FROM SHREPLY r JOIN SHUSER u USING(ID),(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0)n WHERE BTYPE=#{type} AND BPARENT=#{seq} AND r.DEL=0 ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 as rnn, SEQ, r.ID as ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, BTYPE, WDATE, CONTENT, PARENT, BPARENT, r.DEL as DEL, u.NAME as NAME FROM SHREPLY r JOIN SHUSER u USING(ID),(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0)n WHERE r.ID = #{id} AND r.DEL = 0 ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC

SELECT rnn,SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, BTYPE, WDATE, CONTENT, PARENT, BPARENT, DEL FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 as rnn, SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, BTYPE, WDATE, CONTENT, PARENT, BPARENT, DEL FROM SHREPLY,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0)R ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC) A WHERE rnn between #{start} AND #{end};
SELECT IFNULL(count(*),0) AS cnt FROM SHREPLY
